I uploaded the proposal for the new subnetwork: https://ethresear.ch/t/using-portal-network-protocol-for-history-expiry/22658

If there are no major concerns in the next week or so, I will create a PR in https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/ to spec it out.

author: milos88
content:
One thing crossed my mind, and I would like to hear the opinions of others as well.
Considering that Portal network is moving in direction where current history subnetwork is no longer going to be supported, how about we rename it to **legacy_history**, and name newly defined one as **history**? I think this might be the cleanest solution for the long run. Thoughts?
